## Project 2: Food donation bot

This is a food donation bot linked to a machine that are embedded with sensors. When users trying to donate foods to others, they will have to follow the steps below: 

- Step 1: Select a box
- Step 2: Place the food in the box
- Step 3: Close the box and update the info to the telegram bot ![Telegram bot](image/food_donation_bot.jpg)

Subsequently, the information will be forwarded to a group chat which contains all the users who are interested to get the foods.![group chat](image/Group_chat.jpg)
